results.title: Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare
results.brief_description: Just when you thought it was safe to sleep, Freddy Krueger returns in this sixth installment of the Nightmare on Elm Street films, as psychologist Maggie Burroughs, tormented by recurring nightmares, meets a patient with the same horrific dreams. Their quest for answers leads to a certain house on Elm Street — where the nightmares become reality.
results.description: Just when you thought it was safe to sleep, Freddy Krueger returns in this sixth installment of the Nightmare on Elm Street films, as psychologist Maggie Burroughs, tormented by recurring nightmares, meets a patient with the same horrific dreams. Their quest for answers leads to a certain house on Elm Street — where the nightmares become reality.

results.title: Frankenweenie
results.brief_description: When a car hits young Victor’s pet dog Sparky, Victor brings him back to life the only way he knows how. But when the bolt-necked “monster” wreaks havoc and terror, Victor has to convince his neighbours that Sparky’s still the good, loyal friend he was.

constellations_other.name: Stop-motion and animation superstars
constellations_other.description: Despite the ease of new technology and a legacy going back to the beginning of cinema, stop-motion animation techniques are as popular as ever.

results.description: When a car hits young Victor’s pet dog Sparky, Victor decides to bring him back to life the only way he knows how. But when the bolt-necked “monster” wreaks havoc and terror in the hearts of Victor’s neighbors, he has to convince them that Sparky’s still the good, loyal friend he was.

But when the bolt-necked “monster” wreaks havoc and terror in the hearts of Victor’s neighbors, he has to convince them that Sparky’s still the good, loyal friend he was.

results.title: Fraggle Rock
results.brief_description: The Fraggles are a fun-loving community of creatures who live in a subterranean fantasy land where they love to play, sing and dance their cares away, sharing their world with the tiny Doozers and the giant Gorgs. The series teaches empathy and tolerance and encourages children to understand people different from themselves.

constellations_other.name: Pen names, poems and puppets
constellations_other.description: Discover how big-screen adaptations of novels connect to web-based poetry and Jim Henson's Fraggle Rock.

results.description: The Fraggles are a fun-loving community of creatures who live in a subterranean fantasy land where they love to play, sing and dance their cares away, sharing their world with the tiny Doozers and the giant Gorgs. The series teaches empathy and tolerance and encourages children to understand people different from themselves.

results.title: Four Jills in a Jeep
results.brief_description: Reenactments of actual USO experiences of its female stars entertaining troops overseas.
results.description: Reenactments of actual USO experiences of its female stars entertaining troops overseas.

results.title: Four Corners
results.brief_description: Four Corners is Australia’s longest-running investigative journalism/current affairs television program. It addresses a single issue in depth each week, showing either a locally produced program or a relevant documentary from overseas.

constellations_other.name: 1960s television
constellations_other.description: After its debut in the fifties, Australians rapidly became enthusiastic television viewers in the sixties as American imports started to be mixed with notable local productions.

constellations_other.name: Nightly news and laughs
constellations_other.description: Throughout the decades on Australian screens, comedy and news have often gone hand-in-hand.

results.description:
Four Corners is Australia’s longest-running investigative journalism/current affairs television program. Broadcast on ABC1 in Australia, it premiered on 19 August 1961 and celebrated its 50th anniversary in 2011. Founding producer Robert Raymond and his successor Allan Ashbolt did much to set the ongoing tone of the program.

Based on the Panorama concept, the program addresses a single issue in depth each week, showing either a locally produced program or a relevant documentary from overseas. The program has won many awards for investigative journalism, and broken many high-profile stories. A notable early example of this was the show’s epoch-making 1962 exposé on the appalling living conditions endured by many Aboriginal Australians living in rural New South Wales.
description_for_label:
Four Corners is Australia’s longest-running investigative journalism/current affairs television program. Broadcast on ABC1 in Australia, it premiered on 19 August 1961 and celebrated its 50th anniversary in 2011. Founding producer Robert Raymond and his successor Allan Ashbolt did much to set the ongoing tone of the program.

Based on the Panorama concept, the program addresses a single issue in depth each week, showing either a locally produced program or a relevant documentary from overseas. The program has won many awards for investigative journalism, and broken many high-profile stories. A notable early example of this was the show’s epoch-making 1962 exposé on the appalling living conditions endured by many Aboriginal Australians living in rural New South Wales.

results.title: Fosse/Verdon
results.creator_credit: Jessica Yu, Minkie Spiro, Adam Bernstein, The VerdonFosse Legacy, Old 320 Sycamore, Joel Fields Productions, Pyrrhic Victory Productions, 5000 Broadway Productions, West Egg Studios, Fox 21 Television Studios and FX Productions
results.brief_description: Spanning five decades, FOSSE/VERDON explores the singular romantic and creative partnership between Bob Fosse and Gwen Verdon

constellations_other.name: Viral music videos
constellations_other.description: Gotye's 'Somebody that I used to know' was one of the internet's most viral music videos, seconded only to Queen Bey's 'Singles Ladies'.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Jessica Yu, Minkie Spiro, Adam Bernstein, The VerdonFosse Legacy, Old 320 Sycamore, Joel Fields Productions, Pyrrhic Victory Productions, 5000 Broadway Productions, West Egg Studios, Fox 21 Television Studios and FX Productions
results.description: Spanning five decades, FOSSE/VERDON explores the singular romantic and creative partnership between Bob Fosse and Gwen Verdon. He is a visionary filmmaker and one of the theater’s most influential choreographers and directors. She is the greatest Broadway dancer of all time. Only Bob can create the groundbreaking musicals that allow Gwen to showcase her greatness. Only Gwen can realize the unique vision in Bob’s head. Together, they will change the face of American entertainment — at a perilous cost.
description_for_label: Spanning five decades, FOSSE/VERDON explores the singular romantic and creative partnership between Bob Fosse and Gwen Verdon. He is a visionary filmmaker and one of the theater’s most influential choreographers and directors. She is the greatest Broadway dancer of all time. Only Bob can create the groundbreaking musicals that allow Gwen to showcase her greatness. Only Gwen can realize the unique vision in Bob’s head. Together, they will change the face of American entertainment — at a perilous cost.

results.title: Forrest Gump
results.brief_description: Tom Hanks stars as one of the most memorable characters in cinematic history, Forrest Gump, the big-hearted man who was there in the biggest moments in American history. Directed by Robert Zemeckis and written by Eric Roth won six Academy Awards.

constellations_other.name: Dismissing the truth
constellations_other.description: The dismissal of Gough Whitlam by Governor-General Sir John Kerr is one of the most controversial moments in Australian politics. Whitlam’s rebuttal imploring the electorate to ‘maintain the rage’ was immortalised on TV and took on the gravitas of Shakespearean tragedy.

constellations_other.name: Nadia Tass
constellations_other.description: Comedic and cult classics take centre stage in Nadia Tass' career.

results.description: By 1994, when Forrest Gump was released in the States, computer-generated imagery (CGI) had developed to a point where it facilitated almost seamless visual effects. CGI and greenscreen technology allowed Forrest Gump (Tom Hanks) not only to interact on-screen with historical figures including John F. Kennedy, John Lennon and Lyndon B. Johnson but also to memorably compete in a table tennis tournament in which the ping pong ball was digitally grafted onto the action. The uplift and homespun bonhomie of Gump’s character offered American audiences a story of an American war veteran they could champion and take to their hearts. The film was a box office hit and won six Academy Awards including Best Picture, Best Director, Best Film Editing and Best Effects, Visual Effects.
description_for_label: By 1994, when Forrest Gump was released in the States, computer-generated imagery (CGI) had developed to a point where it facilitated almost seamless visual effects. CGI and greenscreen technology allowed Forrest Gump (Tom Hanks) not only to interact on-screen with historical figures including John F. Kennedy, John Lennon and Lyndon B. Johnson but also to memorably compete in a table tennis tournament in which the ping pong ball was digitally grafted onto the action. The uplift and homespun bonhomie of Gump’s character offered American audiences a story of an American war veteran they could champion and take to their hearts. The film was a box office hit and won six Academy Awards including Best Picture, Best Director, Best Film Editing and Best Effects, Visual Effects.

results.title: Formula 1: Drive to Survive
results.brief_description: Drivers, managers and team owners live life in the fast lane — both on and off the track — during one cutthroat season of Formula 1 racing.
results.description: Drivers, managers and team owners live life in the fast lane — both on and off the track — during one cutthroat season of Formula 1 racing.

results.title: For Sama
results.creator_credit: ITN Productions, PBS Frontline, Channel 4 News and Waad al-Kateab
results.headline_credit: Syrian Arab Republic, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2019
results.brief_description: A love letter from a young mother to her daughter, the film tells the story of Waad al-Kateab’s life through five years of the uprising in Aleppo, Syria as she falls in love, gets married and gives birth to Sama, all while cataclysmic conflict rises around her.

constellations_other.name: Cities under siege
constellations_other.description: The Syrian Civil War is an ongoing conflict that is arguably the most documented in history, with images and videos captured by journalists, activists, combatants and victims.

results.creator_credit_for_label: ITN Productions, PBS Frontline, Channel 4 News and Waad al-Kateab
results.headline_credit_for_label: Syrian Arab Republic, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2019
results.description: A love letter from a young mother to her daughter, the film tells the story of Waad al-Kateab’s life through five years of the uprising in Aleppo, Syria as she falls in love, gets married and gives birth to Sama, all while cataclysmic conflict rises around her. Her camera captures incredible stories of loss, laughter and survival as Waad wrestles with an impossible choice– whether or not to flee the city to protect her daughter’s life, when leaving means abandoning the struggle for freedom for which she has already sacrificed so much.
description_for_label: A love letter from a young mother to her daughter, the film tells the story of Waad al-Kateab’s life through five years of the uprising in Aleppo, Syria as she falls in love, gets married and gives birth to Sama, all while cataclysmic conflict rises around her. Her camera captures incredible stories of loss, laughter and survival as Waad wrestles with an impossible choice– whether or not to flee the city to protect her daughter’s life, when leaving means abandoning the struggle for freedom for which she has already sacrificed so much.

results.title: Following
results.creator_credit: Next Wave Films, Christopher Nolan, Emma Thomas and Jeremy Theobald
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1999
results.brief_description: Bill, an idle, unemployed and aspiring writer, walks the crowded streets of London following randomly chosen strangers, a seemingly innocent activity that becomes dangerous when he crosses paths with a mysterious character…

constellations_other.name: Amateur hour
constellations_other.description: Early sound equipment allowed filmmakers and amateurs alike the ability to experiment often with affordable 16mm film.
